items.sentence: You taught French for a few years in Australia, didn't you?
Tom often mixes French and English together when he speaks.
I wish I'd been able to stay in Boston a little bit longer.
If possible, I'd like to do this tomorrow instead of today.
A couple in Boston adopted Tom when he was three years old.
It probably would've been dangerous to do that by yourself.
It probably wouldn't have been hard to do that by yourself.
You never look angry, even though I know sometimes you are.
It means a lot to me to know that you did that just for me.
I want to make sure we don't make the same mistake you did.
